TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_kalahay, title = kalahay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/kalahay} }

S.FORM: u kalahay nu Sakizaya yu kaliumahan maluk i umah, mukunuy tu kalahay u sakasaan sapalidung tu kulul sakacaaykapacilal atu sapabanihiw tu udip.
o kalahay no Sakizaya yo kaliomahan malok i omah, mokonoy to kalahay o sakasaan sapalidong to kolol sakacaaykapacilal ato sapabanihiw to odip.
